plays.text: Penalty to Martin Havlat 5 minutes for Boarding Josef Melichar

Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Kris Beech assisted by Toby Petersen

Goal scored by Chris Herperger unassisted
Penalty to Chris Neil 5 minutes for Fighting Dan LaCouture
Penalty to Dan LaCouture 5 minutes for Fighting Chris Neil
Penalty to Mario Lemieux 2 minutes for Crosschecking Karel Rachunek served by Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Mario Lemieux 2 minutes for Roughing Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Karel Rachunek 2 minutes for Roughing Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Zdeno Chara assisted by Daniel Alfredsson
